articles.author: William Gavin
articles.title: Tech’s biggest bull lists his top 5 AI stocks for 2026, and Nvidia isn’t one of them - MarketWatch
articles.description: Besides Nvidia, Wedbush’s Dan Ives recommended three other ‘Magnificent Seven’ stocks to play the AI trade, plus a ‘cult’ stock and a software company
articles.content: Wedbush Securities analyst Dan Ives, widely considered one of the biggest technology bulls, if not the biggest, on Wall Street has announced his top artificial-intelligence plays for 2026. Surprise: … [+277 chars]
